title: Red Bull tyre plan lacks grip in the 2025 Bahrain GP
summary: History played a part in Red Bull’s attempts to bring Max Verstappen into play for the Bahrain Grand Prix. He had won both previous races here using an offset tyre…

qa_pairs.question: Which driver has won the last two Bahrain Grands Prix prior to 2025?
What was Red Bull's strategy involving tyres for the 2025 Bahrain GP?
Which team does Max Verstappen drive for?
